config.script:
try:
		scriptName = "Operator Console:"
		userId = UserID = self.session.custom.UserId
		self.session.custom.isAcknowledged = False	
		self.custom.CurrentShiftId  = 0
		if self.session.custom.authorizeProduction != 1 :
			system.perspective.navigate('/LoginScreen')
		else:
			try:
				Tabledata = self.params.rowData
				system.perspective.print("RowData:--"+str(Tabledata))
				self.session.custom.WorkflowOperationsId = Tabledata.get('WorkFlowOperationsId')
				self.session.custom.WoNumber = Tabledata.get('WONo')
				self.session.custom.WorkorderID = Tabledata.get('WorkorderID')
				system.perspective.print("workorderId--->>"+str(self.session.custom.WorkorderID))
				self.session.custom.woStatus=Tabledata.get('WoStatus')	
				self.session.custom.Workflow = Tabledata.get('WorkFlow')			
				self.session.custom.WorkflowId = Tabledata.get('WorkFlowId')
				self.session.custom.WorkOrderQty=Tabledata.get('WOQty')
				self.session.custom.woStartDate=Tabledata.get('StartDate')
				self.session.custom.woEndDate=Tabledata.get('EndDate')
				self.session.custom.woActualStartDate=Tabledata.get('ActualStartDate')
				self.session.custom.woActualEndDate=Tabledata.get('ActualEndDate')
				self.session.custom.enterpriseName=Tabledata.get('EntName')			 		
				self.session.custom.plantName=Tabledata.get('PlantName') 	
				self.session.custom.CycleTime=Tabledata.get('CycleTime')
				self.session.custom.Factory=Tabledata.get('Factory')
				self.session.custom.WOType=Tabledata.get('WOType')
				WOType=Tabledata.get('WOType')
				#woAssembytype = Tabledata.get('Assembytype')
				
#				system.perspective.print("woAssembytype-------->>>>"+ str(woAssembytype))
				system.perspective.print("shift Capacity:--"+str(Tabledata.get('ShiftCapacity')))
				self.session.custom.ShiftCapacity=Tabledata.get('ShiftCapacity')
				#self.session.custom.woAssembytype = Tabledata.get('Assembytype')
				
	#			session.custom.CycleTime=Tabledata.get('CycleTime')
				
				
				self.session.custom.ShiftName=Tabledata.get('shift')	
				self.session.custom.shiftId=Tabledata.get('shiftId')
				self.session.custom.AreaID = Tabledata.get('AreaId')		
				self.session.custom.areaName = Tabledata.get('AreaName') 
				self.session.custom.LineID = Tabledata.get('LineId')
				self.session.custom.woAssembytype = Tabledata.get('LineType')
				woAssembytype = self.session.custom.woAssembytype
				system.perspective.print("woAssembytype-------->>>>"+ str(woAssembytype))
				system.perspective.print("LineID---->"+str(self.session.custom.LineID))
				self.session.custom.lineName = Tabledata.get('LineName')
				self.session.custom.Revision = Tabledata.get('Revision')
				self.session.custom.Item = Tabledata.get('PartNo')
				self.session.custom.UOM = Tabledata.get('UOM')			
				stdHC = Tabledata.get('stdHC')
				stdHC = ('{:.2f}'.format(stdHC))
				self.session.custom.stdHC = stdHC
				actHC = Tabledata.get('actHC')
				actHC = ('{:.2f}'.format(actHC))
#				self.session.custom.actHC = actHC
				system.perspective.print("actHC WR To Session: "+str(actHC))
				self.session.custom.salesOrder= Tabledata.get('salesOrder')

#				self.custom.CurrentShiftId = Tabledata.get('shiftId')


				workflowId=self.session.custom.WorkflowId
				Item=self.session.custom.Item
				Revision=self.session.custom.Revision
				WoNumber = self.session.custom.WoNumber			
				AreaName = str(Tabledata.get('AreaName'))
				system.perspective.print("WOType-->"+str(WOType))					 						 						 						 						 					 						 						 						 						 						 						 						 			
	#-----------------------------------------Loading Main view Path Based On Area --------------------------------------
				#if WOType=='1'or WOType==1:
			
				if str(woAssembytype) =='Auto' or str(self.session.custom.woAssembytype) == 'Auto':
					self.getChild("root").getChild("MainViewContainer").getChild("EmbeddedView").props.path='Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/MainViews/ProductionMainView'
#						self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[13].label = "Tool Details"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[8].style.position = "static"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[9].style.position = "static"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[10].style.position = "static"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[11].style.position = "static"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[12].style.position = "static"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[13].style.position = "static"
					
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[8].style.visibility = "visible"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[9].style.visibility = "visible"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[10].style.visibility = "visible"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[11].style.visibility = "visible"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[12].style.visibility = "visible"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[13].style.visibility = "visible"
					
					
					system.perspective.print("assembly_type"+woAssembytype+self.session.custom.woAssembytype)
					system.perspective.print("now am in auto")
				elif str(woAssembytype) =='Manual' or str(self.session.custom.woAssembytype) == 'Manual':
					self.getChild("root").getChild("MainViewContainer").getChild("EmbeddedView").props.path='Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/MainViews/ProductionMainView_manual'
#						self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[13].label = "Tool Details"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[8].style.position = "absolute"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[9].style.position = "absolute"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[10].style.position = "absolute"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[11].style.position = "absolute"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[12].style.position = "absolute"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[13].style.position = "absolute"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[2].style.position = "absolute"
					
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[8].style.visibility = "hidden"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[9].style.visibility = "hidden"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[10].style.visibility = "hidden"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[11].style.visibility = "hidden"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[12].style.visibility = "hidden"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[13].style.visibility = "hidden"
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[2].style.visibility = "hidden"
					system.perspective.print("assembly_type"+woAssembytype+self.session.custom.woAssembytype)
					system.perspective.print("now am in manual")
					

				#elif WOType=='2'or WOType==2:
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("MainViewContainer").getChild("EmbeddedView").props.path='Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/MainViews/CNSView'
#					self.session.custom.moldValidation = True
##					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[13].label = ""
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[8].style.position = "static"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[9].style.position = "static"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[10].style.position = "static"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[11].style.position = "static"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[12].style.position = "static"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[13].style.position = "absolute"
#					
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[8].style.visibility = "visible"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[9].style.visibility = "visible"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[10].style.visibility = "visible"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[11].style.visibility = "visible"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[12].style.visibility = "visible"
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[13].style.visibility = "hidden"
#											
#				else:
#					self.getChild("root").getChild("MainViewContainer").getChild("EmbeddedView").props.path='Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/MainViews/ProductionMainView'
#					system.perspective.print("Not valid Screen Data")
							
				status = Tabledata.get('WoStatus')		
				if status == "On-Hold":
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[4].label = "Resume WO"
				else:
					self.getChild("root").getChild("HeaderContainer").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("HorizontalMenu").props.items[4].label = "Hold WO"
					
				workorderName = self.session.custom.WoNumber
				lineId = self.session.custom.LineID
				shiftId = Authentication.getshiftId(lineId)				
				self.custom.CurrentShiftId = shiftId
				operatorInfo = ProductionOperatorConsole.getdirectIndirectLabour(workorderName,shiftId,lineId)
				system.perspective.print("OperatorInfo; "+str(operatorInfo))
				for i in operatorInfo:			
					DirectUserCount = i.get("DirectUserCount")
					
#					DirectUserCount
					IndirectUserCount = i.get("INDirectUserCount")
					IndirectUserCount = ('{:.2f}'.format(IndirectUserCount))
					DirectUserCount = ('{:.2f}'.format(DirectUserCount))
					actHeadCount =  float(DirectUserCount)+float(IndirectUserCount)
				actHeadCount = ('{:.2f}'.format(actHeadCount))
#				self.session.custom.actHC
				system.perspective.print('On Startup HC: '+str(actHeadCount))
				self.session.custom.actHC = actHeadCount
	#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------		
			except Exception as e:
				scriptName = "Operator Console:"
				errorMessage = scriptName  +' Exception : '+  str(e)
				Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)
				
			#----------------------------------------- Update All Table Validations ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
			# Application use: Below code is updated code for Workorder Start Stop Validation	
			# Developer Name: Sushant Chavan
			# Created On: 18-03-2023
			# Updated By : Sushant --> Removed old validations and kept latest only
			# Updated On : 20-03-2023
			try:
				IsMachineRunning,ComponentValidation,ChecklistValidation,IsMoldValidation = ProductionOperatorConsole.validateWorkorderParameters(WorkorderId)
			except:
				system.perspective.print("Error while fetching validation details at Landing page to main view transition.")
			else:		
				self.session.custom.ComponentValidation = ComponentValidation
				self.session.custom.ChecklistValidation = ChecklistValidation			
				self.session.custom.ChecklistMaterialValidation = True	
			
	#		system.perspective.print('IsMachineRunning :' +str(IsMachineRunning))
	#		system.perspective.print('ComponentValidation :' +str(ComponentValidation))
	#		system.perspective.print('ChecklistValidation :' +str(ChecklistValidation))
										
	except:
			system.perspective.print("Exception:: Production Operaton console Main Loading Page")
			exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
			errorMessage = "Error:"+ str(exc_obj)
			system.perspective.print(errorMessage)
			lineno = tb.tb_lineno
			system.perspective.print(lineno)

self.session.custom.WoNumber=''

	Tabledata=self.view.params.rowData
	self.session.custom.LineID = Tabledata.get('LineId')
	self.session.custom.PlantID= Tabledata.get('PlantId')

	self.session.custom.ProductionOCBackBtnH=1
	productionOperatorConsoleScreenPath = "/ProductionOperatorConsole"
	system.perspective.navigate(productionOperatorConsoleScreenPath)

messageHandlers.script:
WOType = self.session.custom.WOType
	if str(WOType)==str('1'):
		system.perspective.print("workorder type")
		system.perspective.print(WOType)
		self.props.path = 'Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/MainViews/ProductionMainView'
	elif str(WOType)==str('2'):
		self.props.path = 'Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/MainViews/CNSView'
	else:
		system.perspective.print("workorder type")
		system.perspective.print(WOType)
		self.props.path = 'Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/MainViews/ProductionMainView'
		system.perspective.print("workorder type")
		system.perspective.print(WOType)
